release_notes.en-US:
8/30/2022
* Updated Stand Up mode button to match JIRA design system
* Updated column width to auto-update when changed
* Fixed header and column width resizing issue
* Make Stand Up mode more compact (no breadcrumbs, make column headers bolder with less padding).

description.en-US:
Ever wished that large Kanban boards could not be squished? Now you can set your own custom Column width for all of your cards on all of your boards.

And what about that "Detail View"? Wouldn't it be cool if you could resize it to whatever size you wanted it to be with a simple drag of your mouse? Now you can! “Better JIRA” unlocks your productivity, getting the software out of your way and into the background where it belongs!

Also including "Standup Mode" that removes all of the clutter to keep your Standups focused and to the point!

Features:
* Horizontal Scroll of Kanban boards
* Resizable Cards on Kanban boards
* Resizable Detail View (when not using the *new* Detail View popup)
* Open Github Links in a new tab
* Standup Mode that clears out the clutter of side navigations

|------------------
| Updates
|------------------

1/2/2019
* Open *all* Github URLs in a new window
* Fix Create Pull Request Github link to compare selected branch against master by default

12/18/2018
* Open Github URLs in a new tab/window
* Fix Standup Close button not working after a column resize
* Fix Standup Close Button not displaying correctly in Firefox

12/17/2018
* Improve Startup Speed
* Add Config Page Column Resizing
* Add "Close Standup Button"
* Remove strangely styled "Done" Column, this was a feature that was never finished
* Remove `keydown` listening during Standup Mode (this was intended to make walking the board easier)

6/11/2018
* Set up to work for *any* URL, not just *.atlassian.net
* Fix column resizing when using the left navigation to browse to different boards

10/19/2017
* Remove event listener when Standup is off
* Remove Standup Instructions from the page when Standup is off

10/18/2017
* Added Filter Bar back into Standup Mode (it makes a lot of difference in the "New JIRA Experience"
* Improved load time and tightened up the code
* Fixed a bug where Standup Mode could not be toggled

10/12/2017
* Public release!! Better JIRA is now available through the Chrome Web Store!
* Removed visual styles (borders) for resizing the Detail View
  * This was a tough decision because I like to call out that resizing is now possible, but it is better to make the resizing “entirely seamless” than to have a border displaying and hiding every time that you hover of the detail view.

10/10/2017
* Bugfix to allow Resizable Detail View on Retina Screens

10/9/2017
* [beta] Add support for Resizable Detail View (in New JIRA Experience also)

10/9/2017
* Make Detail View width percentage based

10/7/2017
* Style Popup (working on branding)
* The "Quick Load" functionality will now respect “enabled/disabled”
* Add the ability to close the popup with an "x"
* Set Enable/Disable as a 1-click event, as opposed to submitting the form
* Add support for the "New JIRA Experience"

9/22/2017
* Added the ability to "walk" the columns using Shift + ←/→
* Made the load time faster if you have loaded the same page already
* Made the Enable/Disable function work for all styles

caption.en-US: Simply click the “plus” to toggle the visual changes, toggle Standup Mode or resize your columns!
Standup Mode! Say "goo'bye" to the clutter and "Hellloow!" to clarity!

summary.en-US:
Much needed interface improvements for Jira

Ever wished that large Kanban boards could not be squished? Now you can set your own custom Column width for all of your cards on all of your boards. And you can also resize the card Detail View!!
